titleInfo.title: Veiled woman dressed in purple with parasol

mods.abstract: Female adult, Turkish woman, papier-mache dolls, molded and painted features, satin purple full pants front cut-away purple dress with metallic trim, wide belt, same fabric parasol, fez (hat) with veil, all, hand-made. Accompanying information describes as a gift of Miss Norris McClellan.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: Whirling Dervish dressed in white, Seated musician playing reed instrument, Woman with long braids dressed in purple skirt, Turkish Female
